Params: {3: "Blood is still dripping down the blade that went through the girl's chest."}
{3: 'The cold body lies by your feet, slowly taken by the dark.'}
{3: 'â€”Someone answers you. You have no idea who that is.'}
{3: 'But the world has not stopped roiling.'}
{3: 'The sound of the tide hits you over and over again.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'But this journey can still keep going.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "As long as the sound of the tide is still here, the remnants of their wills won't disappear.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'And this world will never be whole.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Have that person stop the sound of the tide... and give up those meaningless struggles.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'There is no need for somewhere new.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'There is no need for that woeful reality.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You wake up on an old bed.'}
{3: 'Everything seems so familiar, but you cannot recall anything.'}
{3: 'Only now do you notice the hooded girl standing by the bed as she smiles at you.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I am here to guide you on your path to stop the sound of the tide.', 4: '1'}
